old/opposite: new 新/former/worn (with age)

bottle/vase/pitcher/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for wine and liquids

wine (esp. rice wine)/liquor/spirits/alcoholic beverage/CL:杯[bei1],瓶[ping2],罐[guan4],桶[tong3],缸[gang1]
